title: Eric Dane's Brave Fight Against ALS
summary: Eric Dane was an actor from the TV show Grey's Anatomy. He got sick with a disease called ALS, which makes muscles stop working. Even though he was very sick, he spent his last months helping others. He raised money and told people about ALS to find a cure. He said he wanted to save his life and help many others too. He joined a group called Target ALS to support research. He also acted in a TV show to teach people about the disease. Eric Dane worked hard to make things better for people with ALS before he passed away.

background_read: ALS is a serious disease that affects how muscles work, making it hard for people to move, talk, or breathe. It has no cure yet, but people like Eric Dane work to raise money and awareness to find treatments and help those who are sick. Learning about ALS can help us understand why it's important to support research and be kind to people with illnesses.
